name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Delicious pepperoni pizza with a blend of cheeses.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with pancetta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a brioche bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.

name: Margarita
description: Refreshing cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Espresso
description: Rich and bold espresso shot made from freshly ground beans.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted bread topped with garlic butter and herbs.
